column2: but the wait is treacherous (we waited an hour and a half to be seated). Huge heaping portions - skillets are to die for. Service is fairly decent
column3: except when they're busy they're in a hurry to get you out of there (they tried taking our plates twice while we were still eating - literally 'eating'). Fair prices
column4: so if you have an appetite
column5: time to kill and don't mind being cattle herded before you've put your fork down
